name: Poké Ball
effect: Put a random Basic Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

name: Mewtwo
description:
It was created by a scientist after years of horrific
gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.

attacks.name: Power Blast
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {P} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: X Speed
effect: During this turn, the Retreat Cost of your Active Pokémon is 1 less.

name: Meowth
description:
All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night,
it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.

attacks.name: Pay Day
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

name: Professor's Research
effect: Draw 2 cards.

name: Potion
effect: Heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

name: Chansey
description:
This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritious eggs
and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.

name: Red Card
effect: Your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck and draws 3 cards.

name: Pikachu
description:
When it is angered, it immediately discharges the
energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

name: Hand Scope
effect: Your opponent reveals their hand.

name: Pokédex
effect: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Butterfree
description:
In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to
release highly toxic dust into the air.

abilities.name: Powder Heal
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bubble Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Clefairy
description:
It is said that happiness will come to those who
see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a
full moon.

name: Pikachu
description:
When it is angered, it immediately discharges the
energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

name: Pokédex
effect: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Mankey
description:
It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of
its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: Venusaur
description:
Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar
energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Greninja
description:
It creates throwing stars out of compressed water.
When it spins them and throws them at high speed,
these stars can split metal in two.

abilities.name: Water Shuriken
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may do 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Haunter
description:
It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders
with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless
shuddering.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Onix
description:
As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many
hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

name: Bulbasaur
description:
There is a plant seed on its back right from the
day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly
grows larger.

name: Jigglypuff
description:
When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously
soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Inferno Dance
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of {R} Energy from your Energy Zone equal to the number of heads and attach it to your Benched {R} Pokémon in any way you like.

name: Magnemite
description:
The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units
at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which
allows it to float.

name: Volcarona
description:
Its burning body causes it to be unpopular in hot
parts of the world, but in cold ones, Volcarona is
revered as an embodiment of the sun.

attacks.name: Volcanic Ash
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {R} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Pikachu
description:
When it is angered, it immediately discharges the
energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

name: Snivy
description:
Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements
swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.

name: Blastoise
description:
It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause
fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {W} Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Cinccino
description:
Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads
over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust.
Cinccino won't tolerate even a speck of the stuff.

attacks.name: Do the Wave
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Eevee
description:
Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to
adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

attacks.name: Growl
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −20 damage.

name: Charmander
description:
It has a preference for hot things. When it rains,
steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.effect: Discard a {R} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Squirtle
description:
When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it
squirts out water with vigorous force.

name: Piplup
description:
It doesn't like to be taken care of. It's difficult to
bond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.

attacks.name: Nap
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Turtwig
description:
It uses its whole body to photosynthesize when
exposed to sunlight. Its shell is made from
hardened soil.

name: Electivire
description:
The amount of electrical energy this Pokémon
produces is proportional to the rate of its pulse.
The voltage jumps while Electivire is battling.

attacks.name: Exciting Voltage
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {L} Energy attached, this attack does 80 more damage.

abilities.name: Lunar Plumage
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Misdreavus
description:
This Pokémon startles people in the middle of
the night. It gathers fear as its energy.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Skarmory
description:
People fashion swords from Skarmory's shed
feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element
in heraldic designs.

attacks.name: Metal Arms
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Chimchar
description:
Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly.
Even rain can't extinguish the fire.

abilities.name: Nightmare Aura
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a {D} Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Togepi
description:
The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said
that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

name: Cherrim
description:
After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes
this form. It's full of energy while it's like this,
and its liveliness will go on until sundown.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Raichu
description:
Its tail discharges electricity into the ground,
protecting it from getting shocked.

abilities.name: Resilience Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Nosepass
description:
It moves less than an inch a year, but when
it's in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the
ground in a split second.

attacks.name: Iron Defense
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks.

name: Gible
description:
It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy
passes by, it leaps out and chomps them.
The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

name: Staraptor
description:
When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave
the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

abilities.name: Defensive Whirlwind
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from {F} Pokémon.

name: Manaphy
description:
It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond
with any kind of Pokémon.

attacks.name: Oceanic Gift
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, take a {W} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that Pokémon.

name: Snorlax
description:
It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds
of food every day. When it is done eating, it
goes promptly to sleep.

attacks.name: Collapse
attacks.effect: This Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Psydrive
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {P} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Cyclizar
description:
Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to
ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of
this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.

attacks.name: Overacceleration
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Overacceleration attack does +20 damage.

name: Sprigatito
description:
Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants.
This Pokémon frequently washes its face to keep
it from drying out.

attacks.name: Cry for Help
attacks.effect: Put 1 random {G} Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

name: Floatzel
description:
With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people
on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.

attacks.name: Attack the Wound
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Pawmot
description:
This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once
it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies
with lightning-fast movements.

abilities.name: Counterattack
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Machamp
description:
It quickly swings its four arms to rock its
opponents with ceaseless punches and chops
from all angles.

attacks.name: Power Press
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {F} Energy attached, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Ekans
description:
By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger
than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Pachirisu
description:
It's one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric
cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.

attacks.name: Plasma
attacks.effect: Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched {L} Pokémon.

name: Bidoof
description:
With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is
more agile and active than it appears.

name: Farfetch'd
description:
The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves
as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire
situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

name: Riolu
description:
They communicate with one another using their
auras. They are able to run all through the night.

name: Exeggcute
description:
Though it may look like it's just a bunch of eggs,
it's a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates
with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.

attacks.name: Growth Spurt
attacks.effect: Take a {G} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Froakie
description:
It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back.
The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise
take when attacked.

attacks.name: Draco Meteor
attacks.effect: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 40 damage to it.

name: Rayquaza
description:
It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and
cannot be seen from the ground.

attacks.name: Spiral Rush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Draco Meteor
attacks.effect: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 40 damage to it.

name: Mimikyu
description:
This Pokémon lives in dark places untouched by
sunlight. When it appears before humans, it hides
itself under a cloth that resembles a Pikachu.

attacks.name: Shadow Hit
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your Pokémon.

name: Cosmog
description:
Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown
away by the slightest breeze, it doesn't seem to care.

attacks.name: Teleport
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Lycanroc
description:
Lycanroc attacks its prey with its
sharp claws and fangs. It loyally obeys
the instructions of a Trainer it trusts.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Alolan Exeggutor
description:
Blazing sunlight has brought out the true
form and powers of this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tropical Hammer
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Alolan Ninetales
description: A deity resides in the snowy mountains where this Pokémon lives. In ancient times, it was worshiped as that deity's incarnation.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Crabrawler
description:
This Pokémon punches trees and eats
the berries that drop down, training itself
and getting food at the same time.

name: Alolan Grimer
description:
There are a hundred or so of them living in
Alola's waste-disposal site. They're all hard
workers who eat a lot of trash.

attacks.name: Poison Gas
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Toucannon
description:
They smack beaks with others of their kind to communicate.
The strength and number of hits tell each other how they feel.

attacks.name: Beak Blast
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Zeraora
description:
It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents
apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack,
they'll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.

abilities.name: Thunderclap Flash
abilities.effect: At the end of your first turn, take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Blacephalon
description:
It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the
explosion of its own head. It's apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

attacks.name: Beat Punk
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 70 damage to itself.

name: Xurkitree
description:
Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently
a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

attacks.name: Electronica
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Kartana
description:
This Ultra Beast's body, which is as thin
as paper, is like a sharpened sword.

name: Stakataka
description:
It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one
appears to be made up of many life-forms
stacked one on top of each other.

attacks.name: Brass Rock
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Dawn Wings Necrozma
description:
Lunala no longer has a will of its own. Now under the
control of Necrozma, it continuously expels all of its energy.

attacks.name: Psychobilly
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

name: Dusk Mane Necrozma
description:
This is its form while it is devouring the light of
Solgaleo. It pounces on foes and then slashes
them with the claws on its four limbs and back.

attacks.name: Black Metal
attacks.effect: Discard a {M} Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shoegaze
attacks.effect: Discard the top 5 cards of each player's deck.

name: Poipole
description:
This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be
chosen as a first partner in its own world.

attacks.name: 2-Step
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Stufful
description:
Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but carelessly reaching out
to touch this Pokémon could result in painful retaliation.

attacks.name: Plasma Hurricane
attacks.effect: Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Vanillite
description:
Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes itself
comfortable by breathing out air cold enough to
cause snow. It burrows into the snow to sleep.

attacks.name: Sweets Relay
attacks.effect: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Jolteon
description:
It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted
by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.

attacks.name: Beginning Bolt
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon evolved during this turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Alcremie
description:
When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them
to berries it's decorated with cream.

attacks.name: Sweets Overload
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 damage for each time your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during this game.

name: Dragonair
description:
They say that if it emits an aura from its whole
body, the weather will begin to change instantly.

attacks.name: Shed Skin
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Audino
description:
This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touching with its feelers,
Audino can gauge other creatures' feelings and physical conditions.

attacks.name: Drain Slap
attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Togedemaru
description:
With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon
takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon.
It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.

attacks.name: Bristling Spikes
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack, do 30 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Greedent
description:
This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fallen berries by wrapping
them in its tail, which is roughly twice the length of its body.

attacks.name: Enhanced Fang
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Eevee
description:
Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to
adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

name: Cleffa
description:
According to local rumors, Cleffa are often seen
in places where shooting stars have fallen.

attacks.name: Twinkly Call
attacks.effect: Put a random Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

name: Horsea
description:
Horsea makes its home in oceans with gentle
currents. If this Pokémon is under attack, it spits
out pitch-black ink and escapes.

attacks.name: Water Arrow
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Chinchou
description:
Its antennae, which evolved from a fin, have both
positive and negative charges flowing through them.

attacks.name: Luring Glow
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot.

name: Houndoom
description:
If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its
mouth, the pain will never go away.

attacks.name: Diving Swipe
attacks.effect: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

name: Kangaskhan
description:
Although it's carrying its baby in a pouch on
its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It
intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.

attacks.name: Cross-Cut
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Happy Punch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, heal 60 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Marill
description:
The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can
stay dry even when it plays in the water.

name: Weavile
description:
Evolution made it even more devious.
It communicates by clawing signs in boulders.

name: Heracross

attacks.name: Single-Horn Throw
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, this attack does 70 more damage.

name: Burmy
description:
To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers
itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

name: Combee
description: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a hundred, packed closely together in a lump.

name: Mothim
description: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.

name: Vespiquen
description: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

name: Cherubi
description: It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked by bird Pokémon that would love to make off with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball.

name: Cherrim
description: As a bud, it barely moves. It sits still, placidly waiting for sunlight to appear.

attacks.name: Worry Seed
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Cherrim
description: After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes this form. It's full of energy while it's like this, and its liveliness will go on until sundown.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Carnivine
description: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

abilities.name: Power Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Houndour
description: It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It uses a variety of cries for communicating with others.

abilities.name: Forest Breath
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may take a {G} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your {G} Pokémon.

name: Heatran
description: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

abilities.name: Speed Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Ragin' Mad Strike
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Houndoom
description: If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its mouth, the pain will never go away.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Marill
description: The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can stay dry even when it plays in the water.

name: Azumarill
description: Its long ears are superb sensors. It can distinguish the movements of things in water and tell what they are.

name: Barboach
description: Its two whiskers provide a sensitive radar. Even in muddy waters, it can detect its prey's location.

name: Whiscash
description: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Snorunt
description: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.

name: Froslass
description: When it finds humans or Pokémon it likes, it freezes them and takes them to its chilly den, where they become decorations.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Snover
description: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain's lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.

name: Abomasnow
description: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

abilities.name: Vigor Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon cost 1 less {C} Energy.

abilities.name: Snowy Terrain
abilities.effect: During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, do 10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Origin Forme Palkia
description: It soars across the sky in a form that greatly resembles the creator of all things. Perhaps this imitation of appearance is Palkia's strategy for gaining Arceus's powers.

attacks.name: Zone Smash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Phione
description: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs.

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Pikachu
description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Manectric
description: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.

attacks.name: Flash
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if the Defending Pokémon tries to use an attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen.

name: Raichu
description: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

abilities.name: Resilience Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Electrike
description: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

name: Clefable
description: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.

attacks.name: Moonblast
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −30 damage.

name: Gastly
description: It wraps its opponent in its gas-like body, slowly weakening its prey by poisoning it through the skin.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent reveals a random card from their hand and shuffles it into their deck.

name: Haunter
description: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.

name: Clefairy
description: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.

name: Gengar
description: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey's shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Unown
description: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.

abilities.name: CHECK
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may choose either player. Look at the top card of that player's deck.

name: Rotom
description: Its electricity-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.

abilities.name: Speed Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Dash Attack
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Sudowoodo
description: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears more similar to rock than to vegetation.

attacks.name: Fighting Headbutt
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon {ex}, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Tyranitar
description: Extremely strong, it can change the landscape. It is so insolent that it doesn't care about others.

abilities.name: Power Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Donphan
description: Donphan is covered in tough hide, so even being hit by a car won't faze this Pokémon. However, it is extremely susceptible to rain.

attacks.name: Rolling Spin
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Rolling Spin attack does +60 damage.

name: Nosepass
description: It moves less than an inch a year, but when it's in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.

name: Larvitar
description: Born deep underground, this Pokémon becomes a pupa after eating enough dirt to make a mountain.

name: Phanpy
description: This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverbank. After playing in the mud, it won't be able to settle down unless it washes its body.

name: Meditite
description: It never skips its daily yoga training. It heightens its inner strength through meditation.

name: Gible
description: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

name: Pupitar
description: Its shell is as hard as bedrock, and it is also very strong. Its thrashing can topple a mountain.

name: Gabite
description: In rare cases, it molts and sheds its scales. Medicine containing its scales as an ingredient will make a weary body feel invigorated.

name: Medicham
description: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe's next move.

attacks.name: Kick Shot
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Linear Attack
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Zubat
description: It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill.

name: Golbat
description: It loves to drink other creatures' blood. It's said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood it's gathered.

name: Crobat
description: Both of its legs have turned into wings. Without a sound, Crobat flies swiftly toward its prey and sinks its fangs into the nape of its target's neck.

abilities.name: Cunning Link
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, you may do 30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Croagunk
description: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.

name: Toxicroak
description: Swaying and dodging the attacks of its foes, it weaves its flexible body in close, then lunges out with its poisonous claws.

attacks.name: Toxic
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Do 20 damage to this Pokémon instead of the usual amount for this Special Condition.

name: Magnezone
description: As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémon seems to be receiving signals of unknown origin while transmitting signals of unknown purpose.

abilities.name: Resilience Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.

name: Bronzong
description: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Snorlax
description: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

attacks.name: Collapse
attacks.effect: This Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Giratina
description: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.

attacks.name: Crisis Dive
attacks.effect: Discard 2 random Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Magneton
description: Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.

name: Mawile
description: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.

attacks.name: Iron Beam Breaker
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {M} Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Magnemite
description: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.

attacks.name: Defensive Unit
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Bronzor
description: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.

name: Origin Forme Dialga
description: Radiant light caused Dialga to take on a form bearing a striking resemblance to the creator Pokémon. Dialga now wields such colossal strength that one must conclude this is its true form.

attacks.name: Time Mash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, during your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

name: Eevee
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

name: Hoothoot
description: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

name: Noctowl
description: Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.

attacks.name: Silent Wing
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand.

name: Starly
description: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.

name: Staravia
description: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.

name: Staraptor
description: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

attacks.name: Brave Bird
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Shaymin
description: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

abilities.name: Sky Support
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Active Basic Pokémon's Retreat Cost is 1 less.

name: Arceus
description: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokémon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.

attacks.name: Power Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Fabled Luster
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Ultimate Force
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

effect: Heal 40 damage from each of your Pokémon that has any {W} Energy attached.

effect: Put 1 random Basic Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.

effect: During this turn, attacks used by your Snorlax, Heracross, and Staraptor cost 2 less {C} Energy.

name: Houndoom
description: If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its mouth, the pain will never go away.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Adaman
effect: During your opponent's next turn, all of your {M} Pokémon take −20 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Marill
description: The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can stay dry even when it plays in the water.

name: Unown
description: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.

abilities.name: CHECK
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may choose either player. Look at the top card of that player's deck.

name: Sudowoodo
description: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears more similar to rock than to vegetation.

name: Exeggcute
description: Though it may look like it's just a bunch of eggs, it's a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.

attacks.name: Growth Spurt
attacks.effect: Take a {G} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Exeggutor
description: Each of Exeggutor's three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don't seem to be very interested in one another.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Fabled Luster
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

name: Snivy
description: Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.

name: Servine
description: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.

name: Serperior
description: It only gives its all against strong opponents who are not fazed by the glare from Serperior's noble eyes.

abilities.name: Jungle Totem
abilities.effect: Each {G} Energy attached to your {G} Pokémon provides 2 {G} Energy. This effect doesn't stack.

name: Morelull
description: Pokémon living in the forest eat the delicious caps on Morelull's head. The caps regrow overnight.

name: Shiinotic
description: Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to sleep. Once this Pokémon has its prey snoozing, it drains their vitality with its fingertips.

attacks.name: Flickering Spores
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Dhelmise
description: After a piece of seaweed merged with debris from a sunken ship, it was reborn as this ghost Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Whip
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra {G} Energy attached, this attack does 70 more damage.

name: Ponyta
description: It can't run properly when it's newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.

attacks.name: Stomp
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Rapidash
description: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.

attacks.name: Rising Lunge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Magmar
description: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {R} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Larvesta
description: This Pokémon was called the Larva That Stole the Sun. The fire Larvesta spouts from its horns can cut right through a sheet of iron.

name: Volcarona
description: Its burning body causes it to be unpopular in hot parts of the world, but in cold ones, Volcarona is revered as an embodiment of the sun.

attacks.name: Volcanic Ash
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {R} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Salandit
description: It taunts its prey and lures them into narrow, rocky areas where it then sprays them with toxic gas to make them dizzy and take them down.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Salazzle
description: Salazzle makes its opponents light-headed with poisonous gas, then captivates them with alluring movements to turn them into loyal servants.

attacks.name: Poison Claws
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Magikarp
description: An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may jump high on rare occasions but never more than seven feet.

attacks.name: Leap Out
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rampaging Whirlpool
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from among the Energy attached to all Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).

name: Finneon
description: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.

name: Vaporeon
description: It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

abilities.name: Wash Out
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you may move a {W} Energy from 1 of your Benched {W} Pokémon to your Active {W} Pokémon.

name: Lumineon
description: With its shining light, it lures its prey close. However, the light also happens to attract ferocious fish Pokémon—its natural predators.

attacks.name: Aqua Liner
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Chewtle
description: Its large front tooth is still growing in. When the tooth itches, this Pokémon will bite another Chewtle's horn, and the two Pokémon will tussle.

name: Cramorant
description: It's so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it's battling midfight.

attacks.name: Dive
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Drednaw
description: Its massive, jagged teeth can crush a boulder in a single bite. This Pokémon has an extremely vicious disposition.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Pikachu
description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

attacks.name: Circle Circuit
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage for each of your Benched {L} Pokémon.

name: Raichu
description: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

attacks.name: Gigashock
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Electabuzz
description: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.

attacks.name: Thunder Spear
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Genome Hacking
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.

name: Joltik
description: Joltik can be found clinging to other Pokémon. It's soaking up static electricity because it can't produce a charge on its own.

name: Galvantula
description: It launches electrified fur from its abdomen as its means of attack. Opponents hit by the fur could be in for three full days and nights of paralysis.

attacks.name: Electroweb
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Dedenne
description: It's small and its electricity-generating organ is not fully developed, so it uses its tail to absorb electricity from people's homes and charge itself.

attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Mew
description: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psy Report
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand.

name: Sigilyph
description: Psychic power allows these Pokémon to fly. Some say they were the guardians of an ancient city. Others say they were the guardians' emissaries.

attacks.name: Spike Draw
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

name: Elgyem
description: If this Pokémon stands near a TV, strange scenery will appear on the screen. That scenery is said to be from its home.

name: Flabébé
description: This Pokémon can draw forth the power hidden within blooming wild flowers. It is particularly fond of red flowers.

attacks.name: Hypnotic Gaze
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Beheeyem
description: Whenever a Beheeyem visits a farm, a Dubwool mysteriously disappears.

attacks.name: Mind Jack
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Floette
description: This Pokémon draws forth what power is left in withered flowers to make them healthy again. It holds a red flower.

attacks.name: Leaf Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Swirlix
description: It eats its own weight in sugar every day. If it doesn't get enough sugar, it becomes incredibly grumpy.

name: Slurpuff
description: By taking in a person's scent, it can sniff out their mental and physical condition. It's hoped that this skill will have many medical applications.

name: Florges
description: This Pokémon creates an impressive flower garden in its territory. It draws forth the power of the red flowers around its neck.

attacks.name: Bloomshine
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

name: Mankey
description: It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.

attacks.name: Focus Fist
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Graveler
description: It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward the peak of a mountain. As soon as it reaches the summit, it rolls back down the way it came.

name: Primeape
description: It becomes wildly furious if it even senses someone looking at it. It chases anyone that meets its glare.

name: Geodude
description: Geodude that have lived a long life have had all their edges smoothed out until they're totally round. They also have a calm, quiet disposition.

name: Golem
description: When Golem grow old, they stop shedding their shells. Those that have lived a long, long time have shells green with moss.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.

abilities.name: Primeval Law
abilities.effect: Your opponent can't play any Pokémon from their hand to evolve their Active Pokémon.

name: Marshadow
description: It slips into the shadows of others and mimics their powers and movements. As it improves, it becomes stronger than those it's imitating.

attacks.name: Revenge
attacks.effect: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Koffing
description: Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw, rotting trash.

attacks.name: Division
attacks.effect: Put 1 random Koffing from your deck onto your Bench.

name: Stonjourner
description: The elemental composition of the rocks that form its body were found to match the bedrock of a land far away from this Pokémon's habitat.

name: Weezing
description: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if the Defending Pokémon tries to use an attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen.

name: Purrloin
description: It steals things from people just to amuse itself with their frustration. A rivalry exists between this Pokémon and Nickit.

name: Liepard
description: Don't be fooled by its gorgeous fur and elegant figure. This is a moody and vicious Pokémon.

name: Venipede
description: Venipede and Sizzlipede are similar species, but when the two meet, a huge fight ensues.

name: Druddigon
description: Druddigon lives in caves, but it never skips sunbathing—it won't be able to move if its body gets too cold.

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Scolipede
description: Scolipede latches on to its prey with the claws on its neck before slamming them into the ground and jabbing them with its claws' toxic spikes.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Whirlipede
description: This Pokémon spins itself rapidly and charges into its opponents. Its top speed is just over 60 mph.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Pidgey
description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: Pidgeotto
description: The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute to its nest over 60 miles away.

attacks.name: Scattering Cyclone
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Tauros
description: When Tauros begins whipping itself with its tails, it's a warning that the Pokémon is about to charge with astounding speed.

effect: Put a Basic Pokémon from your opponent's discard pile onto their Bench.

name: Chatot
description: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.

attacks.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw a card for each card in your opponent's hand.
