name: Petilil
description:
The leaves on its head grow right back even if
they fall out. These bitter leaves refresh those
who eat them.

attacks.name: Genome Hacking
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.

name: Lilligant
description:
The fragrance of the garland on its head has
a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very
difficult.

name: Rowlet
description:
It sends its feathers, which are as sharp
as blades, flying in attack. Its legs are strong,
so its kicks are also formidable.

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

name: Dartrix
description:
This narcissistic Pokémon is a clean freak. If you
don't groom it diligently, it may stop listening to you.

attacks.name: Skill Dive
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Decidueye
description:
It nocks its arrow quills and shoots them at
opponents. When it simply can't afford to miss,
it tugs the vine on its head to improve its focus.

attacks.name: Sniping Arrow
attacks.effect: This attack does 70 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Big Beat
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Big Beat.

name: Pheromosa
description:
A life-form that lives in another world, its body
is thin and supple, but it also possesses
great power.

attacks.name: Jump Blues
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Blacephalon
description:
It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the
explosion of its own head. It's apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

attacks.name: Beat Punk
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 70 damage to itself.

name: Kartana
description:
This Ultra Beast's body, which is as thin
as paper, is like a sharpened sword.

name: Mantine
description:
If it builds up enough speed swimming, it
can jump out above the waves and glide
for over 300 feet.

name: Carvanha
description:
It won't attack while it's alone—not even if it
spots prey. Instead, it waits for other Carvanha to
join it, and then the Pokémon attack as a group.

name: Sharpedo
description:
As soon as it catches the scent of prey, Sharpedo
will jet seawater from its backside, hurtling
toward the target to attack at 75 mph.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Luxio
description:
Strong electricity courses through the tips of
its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting
in foes.

name: Shinx
description:
The extension and contraction of its muscles
generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

name: Luxray
description:
It can see clearly through walls to track down its
prey and seek its lost young.

abilities.name: Intimidating Fang
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, attacks used by your opponent's Active Pokémon do −20 damage.

name: Blitzle
description:
When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear.
It can catch lightning with its mane and store
the electricity.

name: Emolga
description:
As Emolga flutters through the air, it crackles
with electricity. This Pokémon is cute, but it can
cause a lot of trouble.

name: Zebstrika
description:
When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it
shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.

attacks.name: Plasma Hurricane
attacks.effect: Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Xurkitree
description:
Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently
a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

attacks.name: Electronica
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Zeraora
description:
It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents
apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack,
they'll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.

abilities.name: Thunderclap Flash
abilities.effect: At the end of your first turn, take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Clefairy
description:
It is said that happiness will come to those who
see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a
full moon.

name: Clefable
description:
A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will
run and hide the moment it senses people.

name: Trevenant
description:
People fear it due to a belief that it devours any
who try to cut down trees in its forest, but to the
Pokémon it shares its woods with, it's kind.

name: Phantump
description:
With a voice like a human child's, it cries out to
lure adults deep into the forest, getting them lost
among the trees.

name: Morelull
description:
It scatters spores that flicker and glow. Anyone
seeing these lights falls into a deep slumber.

name: Shiinotic
description:
Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to
sleep. Once this Pokémon has its prey snoozing,
it drains their vitality with its fingertips.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may put a random Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

name: Meditite
description:
It never skips its daily yoga training. It heightens
its inner strength through meditation.

attacks.name: Trip Over
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Medicham
description:
Through yoga training, it gained the psychic
power to predict its foe's next move.

name: Claydol
description:
This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient
clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.

abilities.name: Heal Block
abilities.effect: Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) can't be healed.

name: Baltoy
description:
It moves while spinning around on its single foot.
Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on
their heads.

name: Rockruff
description:
This Pokémon is very friendly when it's young.
Its disposition becomes vicious once it matures,
but it never forgets the kindness of its master.

name: Passimian
description:
This Pokémon battles by throwing hard berries.
It won't obey a Trainer who throws Poké Balls
without skill.

attacks.name: Let's Throw
attacks.effect: If Passimian is on your Bench, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Lycanfang
attacks.effect: Discard a {F} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Sandygast
description:
If it loses its shovel, it will stick something
else—like a branch—in its head to make
do until it finds another shovel.

name: Palossand
description:
The terrifying Palossand drags smaller Pokémon
into its sandy body. Once its victims are trapped,
it drains them of their vitality whenever it pleases.

attacks.name: Sand Tomb
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Alolan Meowth
description:
It's accustomed to luxury because it
used to live with Alolan royalty. As a
result, it's very picky about food.

attacks.name: Meddle
attacks.effect: Discard a random Pokémon Tool card from your opponent's hand.

name: Alolan Persian
description:
The round face of Alolan Persian is considered
to be a symbol of prosperity in the Alola region,
so these Pokémon are very well cared for.

attacks.name: Fake Out
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Sandile
description:
It submerges itself in sand and moves as if
swimming. This wise behavior keeps its enemies
from finding it and maintains its temperature.

name: Krookodile
description:
After clamping down with its powerful jaws, it
twists its body around to rip its prey in half.

attacks.name: Poaching Fangs
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, a card is chosen at random from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into their deck.

name: Nihilego
description:
A life-form from another world, it was dubbed
a UB and is thought to produce a
strong neurotoxin.

abilities.name: More Poison
abilities.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon takes +10 damage from being Poisoned.

attacks.name: New Wave
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Krokorok
description:
Protected by thin membranes, their eyes can see
even in the dead of night. They live in groups of
a few individuals.

attacks.name: Grindcore
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Poipole
description:
This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be
chosen as a first partner in its own world.

attacks.name: 2-Step
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Naganadel
description:
It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid
inside its body. It is one of the organisms known
as UBs.

attacks.name: Electro House
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Alolan Diglett
description:
The metal-rich geology of this Pokémon's habitat
caused it to develop steel whiskers on its head.

attacks.name: Happened to Headbutt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Triplet Headbutt
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.

name: Aron
description:
It eats iron ore—and sometimes railroad tracks—
to build up the steel armor that protects its body.

name: Lairon
description:
It loves iron ore. Groups of them fight for territory
by bashing one another with their steel bodies.

name: Aggron
description:
Aggron has a horn sharp enough to perforate
thick iron sheets. It brings down its opponents by
ramming into them horn first.

attacks.name: Giga Impact
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

name: Ferroseed
description:
It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging
to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.

name: Ferrothorn
description:
This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across rocks,
and then uses the tips of its feelers to absorb
the nutrients it finds within the stone.

abilities.name: Steel Spikes
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Herdier
description:
Herdier is a very smart and friendly Pokémon.
So much so that there's a theory that Herdier was
the first Pokémon to partner with people.

name: Stakataka
description:
It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one
appears to be made up of many life-forms
stacked one on top of each other.

attacks.name: Brass Rock
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Lillipup
description:
This Pokémon is courageous but also cautious.
It uses the soft fur covering its face to collect
information about its surroundings.

name: Bewear
description:
Once it accepts you as a friend, it tries to show
its affection with a hug. Letting it do that is
dangerous—it could easily shatter your bones.

attacks.name: Superpowered Hug
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is Knocked Out.

name: Stoutland
description:
These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with humans.
Even a Stoutland caught in the wild will warm up
to people in about three days.

abilities.name: Guard Dog Visage
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, attacks used by your opponent's Active Pokémon cost 1 {C} more.

name: Stufful
description:
Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but carelessly reaching out
to touch this Pokémon could result in painful retaliation.

name: Oranguru
description:
It normally spends its time meditating in the
treetops. It throws Poké Balls and gives other
Pokémon orders as it pleases.

name: Celesteela
description:
One of the dangerous UBs, high energy readings
can be detected coming from both of its
huge arms.

abilities.name: Ultra Thrusters
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may switch your Active Ultra Beast with 1 of your Benched Ultra Beasts.

attacks.name: Moombahton
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Type: Null
description:
A Pokémon weapon developed for a specific
mission, it went berserk during an experiment,
so it was cryogenically frozen.

attacks.name: Quick Blow
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Silvally
description:
This is its form once it has awakened and
evolved. Freed from its heavy mask, its speed is
greatly increased.

attacks.name: Brave Buddies
attacks.effect: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Repel
effect: Switch out your opponent's Active Basic Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

name: Electrical Cord
effect: If the {L} Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, move 2 {L} Energy from that Pokémon and attach 1 Energy each to 2 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Beast Wall
effect:
You can use this card only if your opponent hasn't gotten any points.

During your opponent's next turn, all of your Ultra Beasts take −20 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Beastite
effect: Attacks used by the Ultra Beast this card is attached to do +10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon for each point you have gotten.

name: Gladion
effect: Put 1 random Type: Null or Silvally from your deck into your hand.

name: Looker
effect: Your opponent reveals all of the Supporter cards in their deck.

name: Lusamine
effect:
You can use this card only if your opponent has gotten at least 1 point.

Choose 1 of your Ultra Beasts. Attach 2 random Energy from your discard pile to that Pokémon.

name: Rowlet
description:
It sends its feathers, which are as sharp
as blades, flying in attack. Its legs are strong,
so its kicks are also formidable.

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

name: Pheromosa
description:
A life-form that lives in another world, its body
is thin and supple, but it also possesses
great power.

attacks.name: Jump Blues
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Alolan Meowth
description:
It's accustomed to luxury because it
used to live with Alolan royalty. As a
result, it's very picky about food.

attacks.name: Meddle
attacks.effect: Discard a random Pokémon Tool card from your opponent's hand.

name: Blacephalon
description:
It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the
explosion of its own head. It's apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

attacks.name: Beat Punk
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 70 damage to itself.

name: Silvally
description:
This is its form once it has awakened and
evolved. Freed from its heavy mask, its speed is
greatly increased.

attacks.name: Brave Buddies
attacks.effect: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Celesteela
description:
One of the dangerous UBs, high energy readings
can be detected coming from both of its
huge arms.

abilities.name: Ultra Thrusters
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may switch your Active Ultra Beast with 1 of your Benched Ultra Beasts.

attacks.name: Moombahton
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Big Beat
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Big Beat.

attacks.name: Plasma Hurricane
attacks.effect: Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lycanfang
attacks.effect: Discard a {F} Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Triplet Headbutt
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Grindcore
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Gladion
effect: Put 1 random Type: Null or Silvally from your deck into your hand.

name: Looker
effect: Your opponent reveals all of the Supporter cards in their deck.

name: Lusamine
effect:
You can use this card only if your opponent has gotten at least 1 point.

Choose 1 of your Ultra Beasts. Attach 2 random Energy from your discard pile to that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Plasma Hurricane
attacks.effect: Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lycanfang
attacks.effect: Discard a {F} Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Grindcore
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Triplet Headbutt
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Big Beat
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Big Beat.

name: Arcanine
description:
An ancient picture scroll shows that people
were captivated by its movement as it ran
through prairies.

attacks.name: Heat Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Froakie
description:
It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back.
The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise
take when attacked.

name: Greninja
description:
It creates throwing stars out of compressed water.
When it spins them and throws them at high speed,
these stars can split metal in two.

abilities.name: Water Shuriken
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may do 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Jynx
description:
Its strange cries sound like human language.
There are some musicians who compose songs
for Jynx to sing.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Frogadier
description:
It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise
control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.

name: Growlithe
description:
It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly
stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

name: Pidgey
description:
A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps
its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: Aerodactyl
description:
This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient times.
Apparently even modern technology is incapable
of producing a perfectly restored specimen.

attacks.name: Primal Wingbeat
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent shuffles their Active Pokémon into their deck.

name: Pidgeotto
description:
The claws on its feet are well developed.
It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute
to its nest over 60 miles away.

name: Pidgeot
description:
When hunting, it skims the surface of water
at high speed to pick off unwary prey such
as Magikarp.

abilities.name: Drive Off
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Powerful Bloom
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Inferno Onrush
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Primeval Law
abilities.effect: Your opponent can't play any Pokémon from their hand to evolve their Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scattering Cyclone
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Nihilego
description:
A life-form from another world, it was dubbed
a UB and is thought to produce a
strong neurotoxin.

abilities.name: More Poison
abilities.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon takes +10 damage from being Poisoned.

attacks.name: New Wave
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Weedle
description: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head.

attacks.name: Multiply
attacks.effect: Put 1 random Weedle from your deck onto your Bench.

name: Kakuna
description: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.

attacks.name: String Shot
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Crushing Spear
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Pinsir
description: These Pokémon judge one another based on pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make for more popularity with the opposite gender.

attacks.name: Guillotine Rush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

name: Floragato
description: Floragato deftly wields the vine hidden beneath its long fur, slamming the hard flower bud against its opponents.

name: Sprigatito
description: Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants. This Pokémon frequently washes its face to keep it from drying out.

attacks.name: Cry for Help
attacks.effect: Put 1 random {G} Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

name: Meowscarada
description: This Pokémon uses the reflective fur lining its cape to camouflage the stem of its flower, creating the illusion that the flower is floating.

attacks.name: Fighting Claws
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex, this attack does 70 more damage.

name: Charmander
description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

attacks.name: Stoke
attacks.effect: Take 3 {R} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Charmeleon
description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

name: Magmar
description: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.

name: Magmortar
description: When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire burning in its belly intensifies, rising in temperature to over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

attacks.name: Smoke Bomb
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if the Defending Pokémon tries to use an attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen.

name: Paldean Tauros
description: When heated by fire energy, its horns can get hotter than 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit. Those gored by them will suffer both wounds and burns.

attacks.name: Blaze Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: Tentacool
description: Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer. It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it searches for prey.

name: Tentacruel
description: When the red orbs on Tentacruel's head glow brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.

name: Buizel
description: It inflates its flotation sac, keeping its face above water in order to watch for prey movement.

name: Floatzel
description: With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.

attacks.name: Water Arrow
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Wiglett
description: This Pokémon can pick up the scent of a Veluza just over 65 feet away and will hide itself in the sand.

attacks.name: Spring Out
attacks.effect: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random. Do 30 damage to it.

name: Tatsugiri
description: This is a small dragon Pokémon. It lives inside the mouth of Dondozo to protect itself from enemies on the outside.

abilities.name: Retreat Directive
abilities.effect: Your Active Dondozo has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Pop Out Throughout
attacks.effect: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 3 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 50 damage to it.

name: Dondozo
description: This Pokémon is a glutton, but it's bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.

attacks.name: Ocean Cyclone
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Voltorb
description: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.

name: Electrode
description: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.

attacks.name: Tumbling Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Pachirisu
description: It's one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.

attacks.name: Plasma
attacks.effect: Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched  Pokémon.

name: Pawmi
description: It has underdeveloped electric sacs on its cheeks. These sacs can produce electricity only if Pawmi rubs them furiously with the pads on its forepaws.

name: Pawmo
description: When its group is attacked, Pawmo is the first to leap into battle, defeating enemies with a fighting technique that utilizes electric shocks.

name: Pawmot
description: This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies with lightning-fast movements.

abilities.name: Counterattack
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Abra
description: This Pokémon uses its psychic powers while it sleeps. The contents of Abra's dreams affect the powers that the Pokémon wields.

name: Kadabra
description: Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.

name: Alakazam
description: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.

attacks.name: Psychic Suppression
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any Energy attached.

name: Mr. Mime
description: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.

attacks.name: Juggling
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Drifloon
description: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.

name: Drifblim
description: It can generate and release gas within its body. That's how it can control the altitude of its drift.

abilities.name: Broken-Space Bellow
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may take a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Chaotic Impact
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Gimmighoul
description: This Pokémon was born inside a treasure chest about 1,500 years ago. It sucks the life-force out of scoundrels who try to steal the treasure.

attacks.name: Chest-ouflage
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Machop
description: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it's the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.

name: Machoke
description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

attacks.name: Pummel
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Machamp
description: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.

attacks.name: Power Press
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {F} Energy attached, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Hitmonlee
description: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.

name: Hitmonchan
description: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.

name: Riolu
description: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.

name: Flamigo
description: This Pokémon apparently ties the base of its neck into a knot so that energy stored in its belly does not escape from its beak.

attacks.name: Double Kick
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Aura Sphere
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Ekans
description: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.

name: Arbok
description: After stunning its opponents with the pattern on its stomach, it quickly wraps them up in its body and waits for them to stop moving.

attacks.name: Venomous Fang
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Paldean Wooper
description: After losing a territorial struggle, Wooper began living on land. The Pokémon changed over time, developing a poisonous film to protect its body.

attacks.name: Poison Jab
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Grafaiai
description: The color of the poisonous saliva depends on what the Pokémon eats. Grafaiai covers its fingers in its saliva and draws patterns on trees in forests.

abilities.name: Poison Coating
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Spiritomb
description: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Shroodle
description: Though usually a mellow Pokémon, it will sink its sharp, poison-soaked front teeth into any that anger it, causing paralysis in the object of its ire.

name: Tinkatuff
description: This Pokémon will attack groups of Pawniard and Bisharp, gathering metal from them in order to create a large and sturdy hammer.

attacks.name: Tenacious Hammer
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Tinkatink
description: It swings its handmade hammer around to protect itself, but the hammer is often stolen by Pokémon that eat metal.

attacks.name: Terrific Thumping
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Revavroom
description: It creates a gas out of poison and minerals from rocks. It then detonates the gas in its cylinders— now numbering eight—to generate energy.

attacks.name: Spinning Drift
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Varoom
description: It is said that this Pokémon was born when an unknown poison Pokémon entered and inspirited an engine left at a scrap-processing factory.

name: Gholdengo
description: Its body seems to be made up of 1,000 coins. This Pokémon gets along well with others and is quick to make friends with anybody.

attacks.name: Scintillating Surfing
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each {M} Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

name: Rattata
description: Its incisors grow continuously throughout its life. If its incisors get too long, this Pokémon becomes unable to eat, and it starves to death.

name: Raticate
description: People say that it fled from its enemies by using its small webbed hind feet to swim from island to island in Alola.

name: Wigglytuff
description: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a body slam.

abilities.name: Comforting Song
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from your Active Pokémon.

name: Jigglypuff
description: It hugely inflates its stomach and sings a mysterious melody. If you hear this melody, you'll become sleepy right away.

name: Lickitung
description: If this Pokémon's sticky saliva gets on you and you don't clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch won't go away, either.

name: Lickilicky
description: Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch to many times the length of its body. No one has figured out how Lickilicky's tongue can stretch so far.

name: Bidoof
description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

attacks.name: Carefree Press

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Mr. Mime
description: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.

attacks.name: Barrier Attack
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks.

name: Jynx
description: Its strange cries sound like human language. There are some musicians who compose songs for Jynx to sing.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Mewtwo
description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.

attacks.name: Power Blast
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {P} Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psydrive
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {P} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Ralts
description: The horns on its head provide a strong power that enables it to sense people's emotions.

name: Woobat
description: While inside a cave, if you look up and see lots of heart-shaped marks lining the walls, it's evidence that Woobat live there.

name: Gardevoir
description: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.

abilities.name: Psy Shadow
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may take 1 {P} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to the {P} Pokémon in the Active Spot.

name: Kirlia
description: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.

name: Swoobat
description: Emitting powerful sound waves tires it out. Afterward, it won't be able to fly for a little while.

name: Golett
description: They were sculpted from clay in ancient times. No one knows why, but some of them are driven to continually line up boulders.

name: Golurk
description: Artillery platforms built into the walls of ancient castles served as perches from which Golurk could fire energy beams.

attacks.name: Double Lariat
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

name: Sandshrew
description: It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas. By sand bathing, the Pokémon rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body.

name: Sandslash
description: The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother the Pokémon's spikes will feel when touched.

name: Diglett
description: It lives about one yard underground, where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.

name: Dugtrio
description: Its three heads bob separately up and down to loosen the soil nearby, making it easier for it to burrow.

attacks.name: Dig
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Mankey
description: It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.

name: Primeape
description: It becomes wildly furious if it even senses someone looking at it. It chases anyone that meets its glare.

attacks.name: Fight Back
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Machop
description: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it's the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.

name: Machoke
description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: Machamp
description: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.

name: Graveler
description: It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward the peak of a mountain. As soon as it reaches the summit, it rolls back down the way it came.

name: Geodude
description: Geodude that have lived a long life have had all their edges smoothed out until they're totally round. They also have a calm, quiet disposition.

name: Golem
description: When Golem grow old, they stop shedding their shells. Those that have lived a long, long time have shells green with moss.

attacks.name: Double-Edge
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

name: Onix
description: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

name: Cubone
description: When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head.

attacks.name: Growl
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −20 damage.

name: Marowak
description: This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.

attacks.name: Bonemerang
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage for each heads.

name: Hitmonlee
description: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.

attacks.name: Stretch Kick
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Hitmonchan
description: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.

name: Rhyhorn
description: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.

name: Rhydon
description: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.

name: Kabuto
description: This species is almost entirely extinct. Kabuto molt every three days, making their shells harder and harder.

name: Kabutops
description: Kabutops slices its prey apart and sucks out the fluids. The discarded body parts become food for other Pokémon.

attacks.name: Leech Life
attacks.effect: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Mienshao
description: When Mienshao comes across a truly challenging opponent, it will lighten itself by biting off the fur on its arms.

name: Mienfoo
description: In one minute, a well-trained Mienfoo can chop with its arms more than 100 times.

name: Clobbopus
description: It's very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.

name: Ekans
description: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.

name: Grapploct
description: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.

attacks.name: Knock Back
attacks.effect: Switch out your opponent’s Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

name: Arbok
description: The latest research has determined that there are over 20 possible arrangements of the patterns on its stomach.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Nidoran♀
description: Females are more sensitive to smells than males. While foraging, they'll use their whiskers to check wind direction and stay downwind of predators.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Put 1 random Nidoran♂ from your deck onto your Bench.

name: Nidorina
description: The horn on its head has atrophied. It's thought that this happens so Nidorina's children won't get poked while their mother is feeding them.

name: Nidoqueen
description: Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield its children from any kind of attack.

attacks.name: Lovestrike
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each of your Benched Nidoking.

name: Nidorino
description: With a horn that's harder than diamond, this Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it searches for a moon stone.

name: Nidoran♂
description: The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead contains a powerful poison. This is a very cautious Pokémon, always straining its large ears.

name: Nidoking
description: When it goes on a rampage, it's impossible to control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it's lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.

attacks.name: Poison Horn
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Zubat
description: It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill.

name: Golbat
description: It loves to drink other creatures' blood. It's said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood it's gathered.

name: Koffing
description: Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw, rotting trash.

name: Muk
description: It's thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Grimer
description: Born from sludge, these Pokémon now gather in polluted places and increase the bacteria in their bodies.

attacks.name: Poison Gas
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Weezing
description: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.

abilities.name: Gas Leak
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Poisoned.

name: Pawniard
description: Pawniard will fearlessly challenge even powerful foes. In a pinch, it will cling to opponents and pierce them with the blades all over its body.

name: Bisharp
description: This Pokémon commands a group of several Pawniard. Groups that are defeated in territorial disputes are absorbed by the winning side.

name: Mawile
description: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Meltan
description: It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid metal within its body is how it generates energy.

attacks.name: Amass
attacks.effect: Take 1 {M} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Melmetal
description: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.

abilities.name: Hard Coat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks.

name: Dratini
description: It sheds many layers of skin as it grows larger. During this process, it is protected by a rapid waterfall.

name: Pidgey
description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: Dragonite
description: It is said that somewhere in the ocean lies an island where these gather. Only they live there.

attacks.name: Draco Meteor
attacks.effect: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 50 damage to it.

name: Dragonair
description: They say that if it emits an aura from its whole body, the weather will begin to change instantly.

name: Pidgeotto
description: The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute to its nest over 60 miles away.

name: Pidgeot
description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.

abilities.name: Drive Off
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

name: Rattata

name: Fearow
description: Carrying food through Fearow's territory is dangerous. It will snatch the food away from you in a flash!

attacks.name: Drill Run
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Raticate

name: Spearow
description: Its reckless nature leads it to stand up to others—even large Pokémon—if it has to protect its territory.

name: Jigglypuff
description: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
description: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a body slam.

attacks.name: Sleepy Song
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Meowth
description: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.

attacks.name: Pay Day
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Shadow Claw

name: Farfetch'd

name: Ditto

attacks.name: Copy Anything

name: Doduo

name: Eevee
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

name: Eevee
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

name: Cinccino
description: Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won't tolerate even a speck of the stuff.

name: Snorlax

name: Tauros

name: Eevee
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

name: Tropius
description:
It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit
around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows
twice a year.

name: Leafeon
description:
When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of
sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis
to produce clean air.

attacks.name: Leaf Blast
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each {G} Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Steenee
description:
Steenee spreads a sweet scent that
makes others feel invigorated. This same
scent is popular for antiperspirants.

name: Bounsweet
description:
Its sweat is sweet, like syrup made from boiled-down
fruit. Because of this, Bounsweet was highly valued in
the past, when sweeteners were scarce.

name: Tsareena
description:
This Pokémon is proud and aggressive. However, it is
said that a Tsareena will instantly become calm if
someone touches the crown on its calyx.

attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals a random card from their hand and shuffles it into their deck.

name: Applin
description:
It grows by eating the flesh of an apple.
Applin uses its own body fluid to strengthen
the apple's skin and prevent it from rotting.

name: Appletun
description:
It feeds mainly on sweet apples. It will also eat
small bug Pokémon that are attracted by its
sweet nectar.

attacks.name: Sweets Relay
attacks.effect: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.effect: Discard 2 {R} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Flareon
description:
Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated, and
exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000 degrees
Fahrenheit.

name: Torkoal
description:
It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows
out black soot if it is endangered.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.effect: Discard a {R} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Litten
description:
If you try too hard to get close to it, it won't
open up to you. Even if you do grow close,
giving it too much affection is still a no-no.

name: Torracat
description:
Torracat will let its Trainer coddle it once they've
grown close, but it's a powerful, sharp-clawed
Pokémon, so its Trainer gets covered in scratches.

name: Incineroar
description:
Although it's rough mannered and egotistical, it
finds beating down unworthy opponents boring.
It gets motivated for stronger opponents.

attacks.name: Darkest Lariat
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

name: Salandit
description:
It taunts its prey and lures them into narrow,
rocky areas where it then sprays them with toxic
gas to make them dizzy and take them down.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.effect: Discard a {R} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Salazzle
description:
Salazzle makes its opponents light-headed with
poisonous gas, then captivates them with alluring
movements to turn them into loyal servants.

name: Vaporeon
description:
It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with
a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

attacks.name: Hyper Whirlpool
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Glaceon
description:
It can control its body temperature at will.
This enables it to freeze the moisture in the
atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.

attacks.name: Ice Blade
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Vanillite
description:
Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes itself
comfortable by breathing out air cold enough to
cause snow. It burrows into the snow to sleep.

attacks.name: Sweets Relay
attacks.effect: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Vanilluxe
description:
When its anger reaches a breaking point, this
Pokémon unleashes a fierce blizzard that freezes
every creature around it, be they friend or foe.

attacks.name: Double Spin
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage for each heads.

name: Vanillish
description:
By drinking pure water, it grows its icy body.
This Pokémon can be hard to find on days with
warm, sunny weather.

attacks.name: Sweets Relay
attacks.effect: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Alomomola
description:
It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its
fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Popplio
description:
The balloons it inflates with its nose grow
larger and larger as it practices day by day.

name: Brionne
description:
It gets excited when it sees a dance it
doesn't know. This hard worker practices
diligently until it can learn that dance.

name: Galvantula
description:
It launches electrified fur from its abdomen as its
means of attack. Opponents hit by the fur could
be in for three full days and nights of paralysis.

attacks.name: Electric Shock
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Jolteon
description:
It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted
by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.

attacks.name: Beginning Bolt
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon evolved during this turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra {W} Energy attached, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Sparkling Aria
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Espeon
description:
The tip of its forked tail quivers when it is
predicting its opponent's next move.

attacks.name: Energy Crush
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Joltik
description:
Joltik can be found clinging to other Pokémon.
It's soaking up static electricity because it can't
produce a charge on its own.

attacks.name: Jolt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Woobat
description:
While inside a cave, if you look up and see lots
of heart-shaped marks lining the walls, it's
evidence that Woobat live there.

name: Swoobat
description:
Emitting powerful sound waves tires it out.
Afterward, it won't be able to fly for a
little while.

name: Swirlix
description:
It eats its own weight in sugar every day.
If it doesn't get enough sugar, it becomes
incredibly grumpy.

attacks.name: Sweets Relay
attacks.effect: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Slurpuff
description:
By taking in a person's scent, it can sniff out their
mental and physical condition. It's hoped that
this skill will have many medical applications.

attacks.name: Sweets Relay
attacks.effect: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Sylveon
description:
This Pokémon uses its ribbonlike feelers to send
a soothing aura into its opponents, erasing
their hostility.

attacks.name: Evoharmony
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Evolution Pokémon on your Bench.

abilities.name: Happy Ribbon
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may draw 2 cards.

name: Milcery
description:
This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling
particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.

attacks.name: Sweets Relay
attacks.effect: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Mimikyu
description:
This Pokémon lives in dark places untouched by
sunlight. When it appears before humans, it hides
itself under a cloth that resembles a Pikachu.

attacks.name: Try to Imitate
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.

name: Alcremie
description:
When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them
to berries it's decorated with cream.

attacks.name: Sweets Overload
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 damage for each time your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during this game.

name: Barboach
description:
Its two whiskers provide a sensitive radar. Even in
muddy waters, it can detect its prey's location.

name: Whiscash
description:
It is extremely protective of its territory. If any
foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Carbink
description:
When beset by attackers, Carbink wipes them all
out by firing high-energy beams from the gems
embedded in its body.

attacks.name: Hard Roll
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Mienshao
description:
When Mienshao comes across a truly challenging
opponent, it will lighten itself by biting off the
fur on its arms.

name: Mienfoo
description:
In one minute, a well-trained Mienfoo can chop
with its arms more than 100 times.

attacks.name: Kick Shot
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Umbreon
description:
When exposed to the moon's aura, the rings on its
body glow faintly and it gains a mysterious power.

attacks.name: Dark Binding
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Sableye
description:
Materials from gems it has eaten float to the
surface of its body and can form an infinite
number of patterns among individuals.

name: Purrloin
description:
Opponents that get drawn in by its adorable
behavior come away with stinging scratches from
its claws and stinging pride from its laughter.

attacks.name: Playful Knockdown
attacks.effect: Discard all Pokémon Tools from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Mawile
description:
It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into
complacency, then bites with its huge,
relentless jaws.

attacks.name: Powerful Vise
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Liepard
description:
Don't be fooled by its gorgeous fur and elegant
figure. This is a moody and vicious Pokémon.

name: Togedemaru
description:
With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon
takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon.
It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.

attacks.name: Bristling Spikes
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack, do 30 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Meltan
description:
It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid
metal within its body is how it generates energy.

name: Melmetal
description:
At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and
fall apart. The small shards left behind will
eventually be reborn as Meltan.

name: Dragonair
description:
They say that if it emits an aura from its whole
body, the weather will begin to change instantly.

name: Dratini
description:
It sheds many layers of skin as it grows larger.
During this process, it is protected by a rapid
waterfall.

attacks.name: Giga Impact
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

name: Drampa
description:
The mountains it calls home are nearly two miles
in height. On rare occasions, it descends to play
with the children living in the towns below.

attacks.name: Dragon Breath
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Eevee
description:
Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to
adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

abilities.name: Full-Mouth Manner
abilities.effect: At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, heal 20 damage from it.

attacks.name: Flop-Down Punch
attacks.effect: This Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Veevee 'volve
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can evolve into any Pokémon that evolves from Eevee if you play it from your hand onto this Pokémon. (This Pokémon can't evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.)

name: Chatot
description:
It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them
into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't
attack it.

attacks.name: Tone-Deaf
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Aipom
description:
As it did more and more with its tail, its hands
became clumsy. It makes its nest high in
the treetops.

attacks.name: Double Hit
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Ambipom
description:
It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both
of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze,
that's proof it really likes you.

abilities.name: Catching Tail
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may put a random Pokémon Tool card from your deck into your hand.

name: Audino
description:
This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touching with its feelers,
Audino can gauge other creatures' feelings and physical conditions.

attacks.name: Do the Wave
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Cinccino
description:
Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads
over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust.
Cinccino won't tolerate even a speck of the stuff.

name: Minccino
description:
The way it brushes away grime with its tail
can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on
spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.

name: Skwovet
description:
It stores berries in its cheeks. When there are no
berries to be found, Skwovet will stuff pebbles
into its cheeks to stave off its cravings.

name: Greedent
description:
This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fallen berries by wrapping
them in its tail, which is roughly twice the length of its body.

attacks.name: Enhanced Fang
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Eevee Bag
effect:
Choose 1:

During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon that evolve from Eevee do +10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

effect: During this turn, attacks used by your Decidueye ex, Incineroar ex, or Primarina ex do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Leafeon
description:
When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of
sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis
to produce clean air.

name: Flareon
description:
Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated, and
exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000 degrees
Fahrenheit.

name: Voltorb
description:
It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden
jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.

attacks.name: Big Explosion
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: Ekans
description:
By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger
than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.

name: Lapras
description:
A smart and kindhearted Pokémon,
it glides across the surface of the sea while
its beautiful song echoes around it.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra {W} Energy attached, this attack does 70 more damage.

name: Pinsir
description:
These Pokémon judge one another based on
pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make
for more popularity with the opposite gender.

attacks.name: Guillotine Rush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

name: Electrode
description:
The more energy it charges up, the faster
it gets. But this also makes it more likely
to explode.

name: Ralts
description:
The horns on its head provide a strong power
that enables it to sense people's emotions.

attacks.name: Teleport
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Gardevoir
description:
To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic
power to create a small black hole.

abilities.name: Psy Shadow
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may take a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to the {P} Pokémon in the Active Spot.

name: Arbok
description:
The latest research has determined that there
are over 20 possible arrangements of the
patterns on its stomach.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Kirlia
description:
It has a psychic power that enables it to distort
the space around it and see into the future.

name: Farfetch'd
description:
The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves
as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire
situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

attacks.name: Inferno Dance
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of {R} Energy from your Energy Zone equal to the number of heads and attach it to your Benched {R} Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thundering Hurricane
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

name: Oddish
description: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

attacks.name: Blot
attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energized Blade
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
