Choose 1:

During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon that evolve from Eevee do +10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon that evolves from Eevee.

name: Bellossom
description: Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.

name: Gloom
description: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.

name: Tangela
description: Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this Pokémon's true appearance remains a mystery.

name: Tangrowth
description: Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it pleases. Recent research has shown that these arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Roselia
description: Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance. The stronger its aroma, the healthier the Roselia is.

name: Turtwig
description: It uses its whole body to photosynthesize when exposed to sunlight. Its shell is made from hardened soil.

name: Yanma
description: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It won't miss prey—even those behind it.

name: Roserade
description: After captivating opponents with its sweet scent, it lashes them with its thorny whips.

attacks.name: Poisonous Whip
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Grotle
description: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

name: Kricketot
description: Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.

name: Torterra
description: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground dwelt a gigantic Torterra.

attacks.name: Frenzy Plant
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Frenzy Plant.

name: Burmy
description: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

name: Kricketune
description: By allowing its cry to resonate in the hollow of its belly, it produces a captivating sound.

attacks.name: Entrancing Melody
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Wormadam
description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

attacks.name: Leaf Cutter
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Combee
description: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a hundred, packed closely together in a lump.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Put 1 random Basic Pokémon from your deck onto your Bench.

name: Vespiquen
description: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.

name: Carnivine
description: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

attacks.name: Flog
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Mow Rotom
description: The lawn mower is one of the household appliances that led to the development of the Rotom Dex.

attacks.name: Energy Cutoff
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Shaymin
description: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

abilities.name: Fragrant Flower Garden
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 10 damage from each of your Pokémon.

name: Leafeon
description: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.

attacks.name: Leafy Cyclone
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

name: Slugma
description: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.

name: Magmar
description: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.

attacks.name: Stoke
attacks.effect: Take a {R} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Magcargo
description: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Chimchar
description: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can't extinguish the fire.

name: Magmortar
description: When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire burning in its belly intensifies, rising in temperature to over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

attacks.name: Bursting Inferno
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Monferno
description: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

name: Swinub
description: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.

name: Heat Rotom
description: If the convection microwave oven is not working properly, then the Rotom inhabiting it will become lethargic.

attacks.name: Heat Breath
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Piloswine
description: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks from {R} or {W} Pokémon.

name: Mamoswine
description: This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a while, it was thought to have gone extinct.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from {R} or {W} Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flare Blitz
attacks.effect: Discard all {R} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Regice
description: With cold air that can reach temperatures as low as −328 degrees Fahrenheit, Regice instantly freezes any creature that approaches it.

abilities.name: Crystal Body
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks used by your opponent's Pokémon done to this Pokémon.

name: Piplup
description: It doesn't like to be taken care of. It's difficult to bond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.

attacks.name: Nap
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Empoleon
description: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.

attacks.name: Aqua Jet
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Prinplup
description: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

name: Buizel
description: It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself through water. The tails also slice clinging seaweed.

name: Shellos
description: It used to have a shell on its back long ago. This species is closely related to Pokémon like Shellder.

name: Floatzel
description: With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.

attacks.name: Jet Screw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Gastrodon
description: They normally inhabit rocky seashores, but in times of continuous rain, they can sometimes be found in the mountains, far from the sea.

attacks.name: Muddy Water
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Finneon
description: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.

attacks.name: Elegant Swim
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Lumineon
description: With its shining light, it lures its prey close. However, the light also happens to attract ferocious fish Pokémon—its natural predators.

name: Frost Rotom
description: This Rotom has entered a refrigerator. It leaps around gleefully after it uses cold air to freeze the area around it.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Wash Rotom
description: This Rotom has entered a washing machine. It nods with satisfaction after it floods the surrounding area.

name: Snover
description: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain's lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.

attacks.name: Ice Shard
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {F} Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Glaceon
description: It can control its body temperature at will. This enables it to freeze the moisture in the atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Abomasnow
description: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

attacks.name: Dimensional Storm
attacks.effect: Discard 3 {W} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Manaphy
description: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.

attacks.name: Oceanic Gift
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, take a {W} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that Pokémon.

name: Magneton
description: Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.

name: Magnemite
description: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.

name: Magnezone
description: As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémon seems to be receiving signals of unknown origin while transmitting signals of unknown purpose.

attacks.name: Thunder Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a {L} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Voltorb
description: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.

attacks.name: Big Explosion
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: Electivire
description: The amount of electrical energy this Pokémon produces is proportional to the rate of its pulse. The voltage jumps while Electivire is battling.

attacks.name: Exciting Voltage
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {L} Energy attached, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Shinx
description: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

attacks.name: Hide
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Luxio
description: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

name: Electabuzz
description: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.

attacks.name: Charge
attacks.effect: Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Electrode
description: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.

attacks.name: Sparking Gadget
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Luxray
description: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.

attacks.name: Volt Bolt
attacks.effect: Discard all {L} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Togepi
description: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

name: Togetic
description: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.

name: Rotom
description: Its electricity-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.

attacks.name: Assault Laser
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Togekiss
description: These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they've hardly been seen at all.

attacks.name: Overdrive Smash
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Overdrive Smash attack does +60 damage.

name: Ralts
description: The horns on its head provide a strong power that enables it to sense people's emotions.

attacks.name: Teleport
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Kirlia
description: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.

name: Duskull
description: If it finds bad children who won't listen to their parents, it will spirit them away—or so it's said.

attacks.name: Magical Delusion
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Uxie
description:
Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said
that it can wipe out the memory of those who see
its eyes.

attacks.name: Mind Boost
attacks.effect: Take a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to Mesprit or Azelf.

name: Drifblim
description: Some say this Pokémon is a collection of souls burdened with regrets, silently drifting through the dusk.

name: Drifloon
description: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.

attacks.name: Expand
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Dusknoir
description: At the bidding of transmissions from the spirit world, it steals people and Pokémon away. No one knows whether it has a will of its own.

abilities.name: Shadow Void
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you may choose 1 of your Pokémon that has damage on it, and move all of its damage to this Pokémon.

name: Dusclops
description: It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.

name: Misdreavus
description: This Pokémon startles people in the middle of the night. It gathers fear as its energy.

name: Azelf
description:
Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sleeps at the
bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

attacks.name: Psychic Arrow
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Giratina
description: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has any Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.

name: Mesprit
description:
Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught
humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

attacks.name: Supreme Blast
attacks.effect: You can use this attack only if you have Uxie and Azelf on your Bench. Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Rhyhorn
description: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.

name: Cresselia
description: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

attacks.name: Moonlight Gain
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Rhydon
description: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.

name: Rhyperior
description: It can load up to three projectiles per arm into the holes in its hands. What launches out of those holes could be either rocks or Roggenrola.

attacks.name: Mountain Swing
attacks.effect: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Gligar
description: It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.

name: Gliscor
description: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

attacks.name: Acrobatics
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Hitmontop
description: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.

name: Regirock
description: Every bit of Regirock's body is made of stone. As parts of its body erode, this Pokémon sticks rocks to itself to repair what's been lost.

abilities.name: Exoskeleton
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Nosepass
description: It moves less than an inch a year, but when it's in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.

name: Cranidos
description: A primeval Pokémon, it possesses a hard and sturdy skull, lacking any intelligence within.

name: Rampardos
description: In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of this Pokémon and use its skull, which is harder than steel, to make helmets.

attacks.name: Head Smash
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this attack, this Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

name: Wormadam
description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

name: Riolu
description: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.

attacks.name: Energized Blade
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Hippopotas
description: It shuts its nostrils tight, then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around 10.

name: Hippowdon
description: It is surprisingly quick to anger. It holds its mouth agape as a display of its strength.

name: Lucario
description: It's said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect auras—even those of foes it could not otherwise see.

abilities.name: Fighting Coach
abilities.effect: Attacks used by your {F} Pokémon do +20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Murkrow
description: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

name: Honchkrow
description: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.

attacks.name: Skill Dive
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Sneasel
description: This cunning Pokémon hides under the cover of darkness, waiting to attack its prey.

attacks.name: Double Scratch
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Poochyena
description: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.

attacks.name: Scratching Nails
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Mightyena
description: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.

name: Stunky
description: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.

name: Skuntank
description: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.

attacks.name: Poison Gas
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Spiritomb
description: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.

attacks.name: Swirling Disaster
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Skorupi
description: After burrowing into the sand, it waits patiently for prey to come near. This Pokémon and Sizzlipede share common descent.

name: Drapion
description: Its poison is potent, but it rarely sees use. This Pokémon prefers to use physical force instead, going on rampages with its car-crushing strength.

attacks.name: Cross Poison
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads. If at least 2 of them are heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Croagunk
description: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.

attacks.name: Group Beatdown
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Toxicroak
description: Swaying and dodging the attacks of its foes, it weaves its flexible body in close, then lunges out with its poisonous claws.

attacks.name: Group Beatdown
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

name: Registeel
description: Registeel's body is made of a strange material that is flexible enough to stretch and shrink but also more durable than any metal.

name: Skarmory
description: People fashion swords from Skarmory's shed feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element in heraldic designs.

attacks.name: Metal Arms
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Nightmare Aura
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a {D} Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Darkrai
description: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.

attacks.name: Dark Void
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Shieldon
description: A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokémon, it used its face to dig up tree roots to eat. The skin on its face was plenty tough.

name: Bastiodon
description: The bones of its face are huge and hard, so they were mistaken for its spine until after this Pokémon was successfully restored.

abilities.name: Guarded Grill
abilities.effect: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon takes −100 damage from that attack.

name: Bronzor
description: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.

name: Wormadam
description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

attacks.name: Iron Head
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Bronzong
description: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Probopass
description: Although it can control its units known as Mini-Noses, they sometimes get lost and don't come back.

attacks.name: Triple Nose
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Metallic Turbo
attacks.effect: Take 2 {M} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Heatran
description: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

attacks.name: Steel Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Gible
description: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

name: Gabite
description: In rare cases, it molts and sheds its scales. Medicine containing its scales as an ingredient will make a weary body feel invigorated.

name: Garchomp
description: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.

abilities.name: Reckless Shearing
abilities.effect: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw a card.

name: Lickitung
description: If this Pokémon's sticky saliva gets on you and you don't clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch won't go away, either.

name: Eevee
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Porygon2
description: This is a Porygon that was updated with special data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about many different subjects all on its own.

name: Porygon
description: State-of-the-art technology was used to create Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be created via computer programming.

attacks.name: Licking Fury
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

name: Porygon-Z
description: Porygon-Z had a program installed to allow it to move between dimensions, but the program also caused instability in Porygon-Z's behavior.

attacks.name: Buggy Beam
attacks.effect: Change the type of the next Energy that will be generated for your opponent to 1 of the following at random: {G}, {R}, {W}, {L}, {P}, {F}, {D}, or {M}.

name: Aipom
description: As it did more and more with its tail, its hands became clumsy. It makes its nest high in the treetops.

name: Starly
description: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.

attacks.name: Pluck
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tools from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Ambipom
description: It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze, that's proof it really likes you.

attacks.name: Double Hit
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

name: Staravia
description: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.

name: Staraptor
description: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Bidoof
description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

attacks.name: Super Fang
attacks.effect: Halve your opponent's Active Pokémon's remaining HP, rounded down.

name: Bibarel
description: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.

name: Buneary
description: If both of Buneary's ears are rolled up, something is wrong with its body or mind. It's a sure sign the Pokémon is in need of care.

name: Glameow
description: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

attacks.name: Pose
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Lopunny
description: Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings. If danger approaches, this Pokémon responds with superdestructive kicks.

attacks.name: Jump Kick
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Purugly
description: It would claim another Pokémon's nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.

attacks.name: Interrupt
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose a card you find there and shuffle it into your opponent's deck.

name: Skull Fossil
effect: Play this card as if it were a 40-HP Basic {C} Pokémon. At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play. This card can't retreat.

name: Chatot
description: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Regigigas
description: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.

attacks.name: Raging Hammer
attacks.effect: This attack does more damage equal to the damage this Pokémon has on it.

name: Fan Rotom
description: This Rotom has entered an electric fan. It smirks with satisfaction over a prank well pulled after it blows away everything around it.

attacks.name: Spin Storm
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, put your opponent's Active Pokémon into their hand.

name: Pokémon Communication
effect: Choose a Pokémon in your hand and switch it with a random Pokémon in your deck.

name: Armor Fossil
effect: Play this card as if it were a 40-HP Basic {C} Pokémon. At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play. This card can't retreat.

name: Giant Cape
effect: The Pokémon this card is attached to gets +20 HP.

name: Rocky Helmet
effect: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Lum Berry
effect: At the end of each turn, if the Pokémon this card is attached to is affected by any Special Conditions, it recovers from all of them, and discard this card.

name: Cyrus
effect: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has damage on it to the Active Spot.

name: Team Galactic Grunt
effect: Put 1 random Glameow, Stunky, or Croagunk from your deck into your hand.

name: Cynthia
effect: During this turn, attacks used by your Garchomp or Togekiss do +50 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Volkner
effect: Choose 1 of your Electivire or Luxray. Attach 2 {L} Energy from your discard pile to that Pokémon.

name: Dawn
effect: Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

name: Mars
effect: Your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck and draws a card for each of their remaining points needed to win.

name: Tangrowth
description: Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it pleases. Recent research has shown that these arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Combee
description: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a hundred, packed closely together in a lump.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Put 1 random Basic Pokémon from your deck onto your Bench.

name: Mamoswine
description: This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a while, it was thought to have gone extinct.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from {R} or {W} Pokémon.

name: Shaymin
description: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

abilities.name: Fragrant Flower Garden
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 10 damage from each of your Pokémon.

name: Carnivine
description: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

attacks.name: Flog
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Gastrodon
description: They normally inhabit rocky seashores, but in times of continuous rain, they can sometimes be found in the mountains, far from the sea.

attacks.name: Muddy Water
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.effect: Discard 3 {W} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Metallic Turbo
attacks.effect: Take 2 {M} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Oddish
description:
If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move.
It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

attacks.name: Poison Powder
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Dimensional Storm
attacks.effect: Discard 3 {W} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Bellossom
description:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals
rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.

attacks.name: Petal Dance
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 60 damage for each heads. This Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Gloom
description:
Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor.
The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance
of 1.25 miles.

name: Scyther
description:
It slashes through grass with its sharp
scythes, moving too fast for the human
eye to track.

name: Tangela
description:
Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows
nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this
Pokémon's true appearance remains a mystery.

attacks.name: Sleep Powder
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Pinsir
description:
These Pokémon judge one another based on
pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make
for more popularity with the opposite gender.

name: Tangrowth
description:
Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it
pleases. Recent research has shown that these
arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.

attacks.name: Grass Knot
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 more damage for each Energy in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.

name: Chikorita
description:
A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its
head. It is docile and loves to soak up sun rays.

name: Meganium
description:
The aroma that rises from its petals contains a
substance that calms aggressive feelings.

attacks.name: Bloomshine
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

name: Bayleef
description:
A spicy aroma emanates from around its neck.
The aroma acts as a stimulant to restore health.

name: Ledyba
description:
These very cowardly Pokémon join together and
use Reflect to protect their nest.

name: Ledian
description:
It's said that the patterns on its back are
related to the stars in the night sky, but the
details of that relationship remain unclear.

name: Jumpluff
description:
Jumpluff travels on seasonal winds. Once its
cotton spores run out, its journey ends, as does
its life.

abilities.name: Fluffy Flight
abilities.effect: Your Active Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

name: Hoppip
description:
Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be found
practically everywhere. This is because the wind
carries this species all over the world.

name: Sunkern
description:
It suddenly falls out of the sky in the morning.
Knowing it's weak, it simply feeds until it evolves.

attacks.name: Blot
attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Sunflora
description:
In the daytime, it rushes about in a hectic
manner, but it comes to a complete stop when
the sun sets.

name: Skiploom
description:
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell where a
Skiploom was born by the scent drifting from the
flower on the Pokémon's head.

name: Heracross
description:
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the nectar to
itself, it hurls rivals away with its prized horn.

attacks.name: Single Lunge
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has no damage on it, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Pineco
description:
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell protects it
from bird Pokémon that peck it by mistake.

name: Yanma
description:
Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its
head. It won't miss prey—even those behind it.

attacks.name: U-turn
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Yanmega
description:
It prefers to battle by biting apart foes' heads
instantly while flying by at high speed.

abilities.name: Solid Shell
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

attacks.name: Triple Slap
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Cherrim
description:
After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes
this form. It's full of energy while it's like this,
and its liveliness will go on until sundown.

name: Cherubi
description:
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked
by bird Pokémon that would love to make off
with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball.

abilities.name: En-fruits-iastic
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, attacks used by this Pokémon cost 1 less {G} Energy.

attacks.name: Sweets Relay
attacks.effect: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Typhlosion
description:
If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything
that touches it will instantly go up in flames.

abilities.name: Fire Breath
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Burned.

name: Slugma
description:
A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers
around in a constant search for warm places.

name: Magby
description:
This Pokémon is still small and timid.
Whenever Magby gets excited or surprised,
flames leak from its mouth and its nose.

attacks.name: Toasty Toss
attacks.effect: Take a {R} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Basic Pokémon.

name: Ninetales
description:
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails
is loaded with supernatural powers.

attacks.name: Scorching Breath
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

name: Vulpix
description:
While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it
grows, several new tails are sprouted.

name: Magcargo
description:
Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames
that circulate throughout its body.

attacks.name: Spurt Fire
attacks.effect: 1 other Pokémon (either yours or your opponent's) is chosen at random 3 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 50 damage to it.

name: Cyndaquil
description:
It is timid and always curls itself up in a ball.
If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.

name: Quilava
description:
Before battle, it turns its back on its opponent to
demonstrate how ferociously its fire blazes.

name: Entei
description:
A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said
that one is born every time a new volcano appears.

attacks.name: Strong Flare
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 random Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Phoenix Turbo
attacks.effect: Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach them to your Benched Basic Pokémon in any way you like.

name: Darumaka
description:
It derives its power from fire burning inside
its body. If the fire dwindles, this Pokémon will
immediately fall asleep.

name: Darmanitan
description:
The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokémon
can deliver punches capable of obliterating a
dump truck.

name: Heatmor
description:
There's a hole in its tail that allows it to draw in
the air it needs to keep its fire burning. If the
hole gets blocked, this Pokémon will fall ill.

attacks.name: Roasting Heat
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Burned, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Poliwag
description:
For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking.
The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of
the Pokémon's innards showing through the skin.

name: Poliwhirl
description:
Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness.
This trait of Poliwhirl's has been used in place of
lullabies to get children to go to sleep.

name: Politoed
description:
At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on the shores
of lakes. They announce their territorial claims by
letting out cries that sound like shouting.

abilities.name: Lordly Cheering
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, attacks used by your Pokémon that evolve from Poliwhirl do +40 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Horsea
description:
Horsea makes its home in oceans with gentle
currents. If this Pokémon is under attack, it spits
out pitch-black ink and escapes.

name: Seadra
description:
It's the males that raise the offspring. While
Seadra are raising young, the spines on their
backs secrete thicker and stronger poison.

attacks.name: Stormy Prison
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Totodile
description:
It is small but rough and tough. It won't hesitate to
take a bite out of anything that moves.

name: Gyarados
description:
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.
It remains enraged until it demolishes
everything around it.

attacks.name: Wild Swing
attacks.effect: You may discard any number of your Benched {W} Pokémon. This attack does 40 more damage for each Benched Pokémon you discarded in this way.

name: Magikarp
description:
An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may
jump high on rare occasions but never more
than seven feet.

attacks.name: Splashing Dodge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Croconaw
description:
If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its
place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.

name: Feraligatr
description:
It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding
speed when it attacks and bites prey.

attacks.name: Destructive Whirlpool
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Marill
description:
The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can
stay dry even when it plays in the water.

name: Azumarill
description:
Its long ears are superb sensors. It can distinguish
the movements of things in water and tell what
they are.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from {R} or {W} Pokémon.

name: Wooper
description:
This Pokémon lives in cold water. It will leave the
water to search for food when it gets cold outside.

name: Corsola
description:
It will regrow any branches that break off its
head. People keep particularly beautiful Corsola
branches as charms to promote safe childbirth.

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.effect: Put a random Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

name: Quagsire
description:
It has an easygoing nature. It doesn't care if it
bumps its head on boats and boulders
while swimming.

name: Qwilfish
description:
Be cautious if this Pokémon starts sucking in
water—it will soon attack by scattering the toxic
spikes that grow all over its body.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Remoraid
description:
The water they shoot from their mouths can hit
moving prey from more than 300 feet away.

name: Suicune
description:
It races around the world to purify fouled water.
It dashes away with the north wind.

attacks.name: Cure Stream
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −20 damage.

name: Delibird
description:
It carries food all day long. There are tales about
lost people who were saved by the food it had.

attacks.name: Stumbling Draw
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

name: Octillery
description:
Its instinct is to bury itself in holes. It often steals
the nesting holes of others to sleep in them.

attacks.name: Octazooka
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon tries to use an attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen. This effect lasts until the Defending Pokémon leaves the Active Spot, and it doesn't stack.

name: Mantine
description:
While elegantly swimming in the sea, it ignores
Remoraid that cling to its fins seeking food scraps.

attacks.name: Dive
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Corphish
description:
No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will
adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.

name: Ducklett
description:
When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water,
escaping under cover of the spray.

name: Crawdaunt
description:
A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws.
It is said to be extremely hard to raise.

abilities.name: Unruly Claw
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Swanna
description:
Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap
their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.

attacks.name: Feathery Cyclone
attacks.effect: Move all Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Chinchou
description:
Its antennae, which evolved from a fin, have both
positive and negative charges flowing through them.

attacks.name: Flashing Signal
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Pichu
description:
It is unskilled at storing electric power.
Any kind of shock causes it to discharge
energy spontaneously.

attacks.name: Crackly Toss
attacks.effect: Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Basic Pokémon.

name: Flaaffy
description:
As a result of storing too much electricity,
it developed patches where even downy
wool won't grow.

name: Ampharos
description:
The bright light on its tail can be seen far
away. It has been treasured since ancient
times as a beacon.

attacks.name: Thunder Punch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Raikou
description:
The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts
at will. They say that it descended with lightning.

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Elekid
description:
When a storm approaches, this Pokémon gets
restless. Once Elekid hears the sound of thunder,
it gets full-on rowdy.

attacks.name: Zappy Shot
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Mareep
description:
If static electricity builds in its body, its fleece
doubles in volume. Touching it will shock you.

name: Slowpoke
description:
It is incredibly slow and dopey. It takes five
seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

attacks.name: Rest
attacks.effect: This Pokémon is now Asleep. Heal 30 damage from it.

name: Smoochum
description:
If its face gets even slightly dirty, Smoochum will
bathe immediately. But if its body gets dirty,
Smoochum doesn't really seem to care.

attacks.name: Shivery Wave
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Emolga
description:
As Emolga flutters through the air, it crackles
with electricity. This Pokémon is cute, but it can
cause a lot of trouble.

attacks.name: Raging Thunder
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Jynx
description:
Its strange cries sound like human language.
There are some musicians who compose songs
for Jynx to sing.

attacks.name: Attract Smack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Slowking
description:
When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke's
head and unlocked an extraordinary power.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Togepi
description:
The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said
that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

attacks.name: Charm
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −20 damage.

name: Cleffa
description:
According to local rumors, Cleffa are often seen
in places where shooting stars have fallen.

attacks.name: Twinkly Call
attacks.effect: Put a random Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

name: Togetic
description:
They say that it will appear before kindhearted,
caring people and shower them with happiness.

name: Togekiss
description:
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near
conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they've hardly
been seen at all.

abilities.name: Celestial Blessing
abilities.effect: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.

name: Natu
description:
It is extremely good at climbing tree trunks and
likes to eat the new sprouts on the trees.

name: Xatu
description:
They say that it stays still and quiet because it is
seeing both the past and future at the same time.

attacks.name: Life Drain
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon's remaining HP is now 10.

name: Unown
description:
Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape
appears to have some meaning.

abilities.name: POWER
abilities.effect: This Ability works if you have any Unown in play with an Ability other than . Attacks used by your Pokémon do +10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Girafarig
description:
Girafarig's tail has a small head. It instinctively
bites at any foe that approaches the Pokémon
from behind.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Psychic Healing
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

name: Wobbuffet
description:
It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its
body to pump up its counterstrike.

attacks.name: Reply Strongly
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn while it was in the Active Spot, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Unown
description:
Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape
appears to have some meaning.

abilities.name: GUARD
abilities.effect: This Ability works if you have any Unown in play with an Ability other than . All of your Pokémon take −10 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Musharna
description:
When dark mists emanate from its body, don't
get too near. If you do, your nightmares will
become reality.

attacks.name: Dream Dance
attacks.effect: Both Active Pokémon are now Asleep.

name: Granbull
description:
While it has powerful jaws, it doesn't care for
disputes, so it rarely has a chance to display
their might.

attacks.name: Wild Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Snubbull
description:
It grows close to others easily and is also easily
spoiled. The disparity between its face and its
actions makes many young people wild about it.

name: Munna
description:
Late at night, it appears beside people's pillows.
As it feeds on dreams, the patterns on its body
give off a faint glow.

name: Onix
description:
As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many
hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

name: Swinub
description:
It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up
food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.

name: Gliscor
description:
It observes prey while hanging inverted from
branches. When the chance presents itself,
it swoops!

name: Gligar
description:
It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey,
it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.

name: Sudowoodo
description:
Although it always pretends to be a tree,
its composition appears more similar to
rock than to vegetation.

name: Piloswine
description:
If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back
stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.

name: Mamoswine
description:
This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings
from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a
while, it was thought to have gone extinct.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Phanpy
description:
This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverbank.
After playing in the mud, it won't be able to
settle down unless it washes its body.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Gigantic Press
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {F} Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Tyrogue
description:
It is always bursting with energy. To make itself
stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.

name: Larvitar
description:
Born deep underground, this Pokémon
becomes a pupa after eating enough
dirt to make a mountain.

name: Hitmontop
description:
It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high
speed, it may bore its way into the ground.

attacks.name: Piercing Spin
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Barbaracle
description:
Seven Binacle come together to form one
Barbaracle. The Binacle that serves as the head
gives orders to those serving as the limbs.

name: Zubat
description:
It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check
its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies
around with skill.

attacks.name: Venomous Fang
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Binacle
description:
After two Binacle find a suitably sized rock, they
adhere themselves to it and live together.
They cooperate to gather food during high tide.

attacks.name: Dual Chop
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.

name: Pupitar
description:
This pupa flies around wildly by venting with
great force the gas pressurized inside its body.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.

name: Golbat
description:
It loves to drink other creatures' blood. It's said
that if it finds others of its kind going hungry,
it sometimes shares the blood it's gathered.

attacks.name: Venomous Fang
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Ariados
description:
Every night, it wanders around in search of
prey, whose movements it restrains by spewing
threads before it bites into them with its fangs.

attacks.name: Bind Down
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

abilities.name: Dark Chase
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has damage on it to the Active Spot.

name: Spinarak
description:
It lies still in the same pose for days in its web,
waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

attacks.name: Venomous Slash
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Murkrow
description:
Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to
bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent reveals a random card from their hand and shuffles it into their deck.

name: Honchkrow
description:
It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never
forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.

name: Sneasel
description:
This cunning Pokémon hides under the cover of
darkness, waiting to attack its prey.

name: Weavile
description:
Evolution made it even more devious.
It communicates by clawing signs in boulders.

name: Houndour
description:
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It uses a
variety of cries for communicating with others.

name: Houndoom
description:
If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its
mouth, the pain will never go away.

attacks.name: Diving Swipe
attacks.effect: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

name: Tyranitar
description:
Extremely strong, it can change the landscape.
It is so insolent that it doesn't care about others.

abilities.name: Energy Plunder
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may move all {D} Energy from each of your Pokémon to this Pokémon.

name: Forretress
description:
It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scatters
pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away.

name: Absol
description:
Swift as the wind, Absol races through fields and
mountains. Its curved, bow-like horn is acutely
sensitive to the warning signs of natural disasters.

attacks.name: Leap Over
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Scizor
description:
This Pokémon's pincers, which contain steel, can
crush any hard object they get ahold of into bits.

attacks.name: Gale Thrust
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon moved from your Bench to the Active Spot this turn, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Steelix
description:
It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years,
its composition changes to become diamond-like.

name: Mawile
description:
It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into
complacency, then bites with its huge,
relentless jaws.

name: Klink
description:
The two minigears that compose this Pokémon
are closer than twins. They mesh well only with
each other.

name: Klang
description:
When Klang goes all out, the minigear links up
perfectly with the outer part of the big gear, and
this Pokémon's rotation speed increases sharply.

name: Klinklang
description:
From its spikes, it launches powerful blasts of
electricity. Its red core contains an enormous
amount of energy.

attacks.name: Gear Spinner
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Gear Spinner attack does +70 damage.

attacks.name: Steel Wing
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Spearow
description:
Its reckless nature leads it to stand up to
others—even large Pokémon—if it has to protect
its territory.

name: Fearow
description:
Carrying food through Fearow's territory is
dangerous. It will snatch the food away from
you in a flash!

attacks.name: Peck Bugs
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {G} Pokémon, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Chansey
description:
This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritious eggs
and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.

attacks.name: Scrunch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks.

name: Blissey
description:
Anyone who takes even one taste of Blissey's
egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant
to everyone.

attacks.name: Energy Blow
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Kangaskhan
description:
Although it's carrying its baby in a pouch on
its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It
intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.

attacks.name: Cross-Cut
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Eevee
description:
Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to
adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.effect: Put a random Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

name: Porygon
description:
State-of-the-art technology was used to create
Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be
created via computer programming.

name: Porygon-Z
description:
Porygon-Z had a program installed to allow it to
move between dimensions, but the program also
caused instability in Porygon-Z's behavior.

attacks.name: Slowing Beam
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon cost 1 {C} more.

name: Porygon2
description:
This is a Porygon that was updated with special
data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about
many different subjects all on its own.

abilities.name: Buggy Evolution
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach an Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, put a random card from your deck that evolves from this Pokémon onto this Pokémon to evolve it.

name: Furret
description:
The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up
around them. It corners foes with speed.

attacks.name: Tail Smash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Sentret
description:
When acting as a lookout, it warns others of danger
by screeching and hitting the ground with its tail.

name: Hoothoot
description:
It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so
fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can't be Asleep.

name: Noctowl
description:
Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to
see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.

attacks.name: Fly
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Aipom
description:
As it did more and more with its tail, its hands
became clumsy. It makes its nest high in
the treetops.

attacks.name: Imitate
attacks.effect: Draw cards until you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent.

name: Ambipom
description:
It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both
of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze,
that's proof it really likes you.

name: Teddiursa
description:
Its paws are soaked in oodles of honey. When
nervous, Teddiursa will lick its paws and soon
have a smile back on its face.

attacks.name: Honey Snack
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Dunsparce
description:
It creates mazes in dark locations. When spotted,
it flees into the ground by digging with its tail.

attacks.name: Sudden Flash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Ursaring
description:
It usually wears a hardened expression, but when
it's licking up honey—which it loves—the joy it
feels will cause it to break into a wide grin.

attacks.name: Swing Around
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Stantler
description:
This Pokémon apparently used to live in much
harsher environments, and thus it once had
stronger psychic powers than it does now.

attacks.name: Enhanced Horns
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Smeargle
description:
The fluid of Smeargle's tail secretions changes
in the intensity of its hue as the Pokémon's
emotions change.

attacks.name: Splatter Coating
attacks.effect: Change the type of a random Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon to 1 of the following at random: {G}, {R}, {W}, {L}, {P}, {F}, {D}, or {M}.

attacks.name: Elemental Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Bouffalant
description:
These Pokémon can crush a car with no more
than a headbutt. Bouffalant with more hair on
their heads hold higher positions within the herd.

attacks.name: Continuous Headbutt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 70 damage for each heads.

name: Elemental Switch
effect: Move a {R}, {W}, or {L} Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

name: Rescue Scarf
effect: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, put it into your hand instead of the discard pile.

name: Dark Pendant
effect: If the {D} Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, your opponent reveals a random card from their hand and shuffles it into their deck.

name: Steel Apron
effect: The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to takes −10 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon, recovers from all Special Conditions, and can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

name: Squirt Bottle
effect: Discard a {R} Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Lyra
effect: Switch your Active Pokémon that has damage on it with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Will
effect: The next time you flip any number of coins for the effect of an attack, Ability, or Trainer card after using this card on this turn, the first coin flip will definitely be heads.

name: Fisher
effect: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, a {W} Pokémon is chosen at random from your discard pile and put into your hand.

name: Silver

name: Jasmine
effect: During your opponent's next turn, all of your Steelix and Skarmory ex take −50 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Hiker

name: Chikorita
description:
A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its
head. It is docile and loves to soak up sun rays.

name: Bellossom
description:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals
rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.

attacks.name: Petal Dance
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 60 damage for each heads. This Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Heracross
description:
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the nectar to
itself, it hurls rivals away with its prized horn.

attacks.name: Single Lunge
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has no damage on it, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Magby
description:
This Pokémon is still small and timid.
Whenever Magby gets excited or surprised,
flames leak from its mouth and its nose.

attacks.name: Toasty Toss
attacks.effect: Take a {R} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Basic Pokémon.

name: Cyndaquil
description:
It is timid and always curls itself up in a ball.
If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.

name: Octillery
description:
Its instinct is to bury itself in holes. It often steals
the nesting holes of others to sleep in them.

attacks.name: Octazooka

name: Delibird
description:
It carries food all day long. There are tales about
lost people who were saved by the food it had.

attacks.name: Stumbling Draw
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

name: Totodile
description:
It is small but rough and tough. It won't hesitate to
take a bite out of anything that moves.

name: Qwilfish
description:
Be cautious if this Pokémon starts sucking in
water—it will soon attack by scattering the toxic
spikes that grow all over its body.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Pichu
description:
It is unskilled at storing electric power.
Any kind of shock causes it to discharge
energy spontaneously.

attacks.name: Crackly Toss
attacks.effect: Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Basic Pokémon.

name: Ampharos
description:
The bright light on its tail can be seen far
away. It has been treasured since ancient
times as a beacon.

attacks.name: Thunder Punch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Gligar
description:
It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey,
it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.

name: Wobbuffet
description:
It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its
body to pump up its counterstrike.

attacks.name: Reply Strongly
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn while it was in the Active Spot, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Xatu
description:
They say that it stays still and quiet because it is
seeing both the past and future at the same time.

attacks.name: Life Drain
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon's remaining HP is now 10.

name: Togepi
description:
The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said
that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

attacks.name: Charm
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −20 damage.

name: Murkrow
description:
Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to
bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent reveals a random card from their hand and shuffles it into their deck.

name: Spinarak
description:
It lies still in the same pose for days in its web,
waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

name: Tyranitar
description:
Extremely strong, it can change the landscape.
It is so insolent that it doesn't care about others.

name: Scizor
description:
This Pokémon's pincers, which contain steel, can
crush any hard object they get ahold of into bits.

egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant
to everyone.

head. It won't miss prey—even those behind it.

description:
An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may
jump high on rare occasions but never more
than seven feet.

Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated,
and exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000
degrees Fahrenheit.

description:
It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with
a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Magneton
description:
Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic
force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.

abilities.name: Volt Charge
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Magnemite
description:
The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units
at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which
allows it to float.

name: Gyarados
description:
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.
It remains enraged until it demolishes
everything around it.

attacks.name: Wild Swing
attacks.effect: You may discard any number of your Benched {W} Pokémon. This attack does 40 more damage for each Benched Pokémon you discarded in this way.

name: Jolteon
description:
It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted
by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.

attacks.name: Beginning Bolt
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon evolved during this turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Misdreavus
description:
This Pokémon startles people in the middle of
the night. It gathers fear as its energy.

name: Mankey
description:
It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of
its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.

attacks.name: Focus Fist
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Nidorina
description:
The horn on its head has atrophied. It's thought
that this happens so Nidorina's children won't get
poked while their mother is feeding them.

name: Primeape
description:
It becomes wildly furious if it even senses
someone looking at it. It chases anyone
that meets its glare.

attacks.name: Fight Back
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Nidoran♀
description:
Females are more sensitive to smells than males.
While foraging, they'll use their whiskers to check
wind direction and stay downwind of predators.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Put 1 random Nidoran♂ from your deck onto your Bench.

name: Nidoqueen
description:
Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense.
With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield
its children from any kind of attack.

attacks.name: Lovestrike
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each of your Benched Nidoking.

name: Nidoran♂
description:
The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead contains
a powerful poison. This is a very cautious
Pokémon, always straining its large ears.

name: Nidorino
description:
With a horn that's harder than diamond, this
Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it
searches for a moon stone.

name: Nidoking
description:
When it goes on a rampage, it's impossible to
control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it's
lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.

attacks.name: Poison Horn
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Sneasel
description:
This cunning Pokémon hides under the cover of
darkness, waiting to attack its prey.

name: Lickitung
description:
If this Pokémon's sticky saliva gets on you and
you don't clean it off, an intense itch will set in.
The itch won't go away, either.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Eevee
description:
Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to
adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.effect: Put a random Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

attacks.name: Rampaging Whirlpool
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from among the Energy attached to all Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).

abilities.name: Snowy Terrain
abilities.effect: During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, do 10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Skiploom
description:
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell where a
Skiploom was born by the scent drifting from the
flower on the Pokémon's head.

attacks.name: Bounce
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Breeze-By Attack
attacks.effect: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Hoppip
description:
Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be found
practically everywhere. This is because the wind
carries this species all over the world.

name: Sunkern
description:
It suddenly falls out of the sky in the morning.
Knowing it's weak, it simply feeds until it evolves.

name: Celebi
description:
This Pokémon wanders across time. Grass and trees
flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.

attacks.name: Temporal Leaves
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an evolved Pokémon, devolve it by putting the highest Stage Evolution card on it into your opponent's hand.

name: Sunflora
description:
In the daytime, it rushes about in a hectic
manner, but it comes to a complete stop when
the sun sets.

attacks.name: Trip Over
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Durant
description:
They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel
armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

attacks.name: Mountain Munch
attacks.effect: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

name: Magcargo
description:
Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames
that circulate throughout its body.

name: Slugma
description:
A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers
around in a constant search for warm places.

abilities.name: Legendary Pulse
abilities.effect: At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, draw a card.

attacks.name: Blazing Beatdown
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {R} Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Fletchinder
description:
Fletchinder scatters embers in tall grass
where bug Pokémon might be hiding and
then catches them as they come leaping out.

name: Talonflame
description:
It has top-notch flying capabilities. It flies
around easily, even while carrying prey
that weighs more than 220 lbs.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Poliwag
description:
For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking.
The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of
the Pokémon's innards showing through the skin.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Put 1 random Poliwag from your deck onto your Bench.

name: Poliwhirl
description:
Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness.
This trait of Poliwhirl's has been used in place of
lullabies to get children to go to sleep.

name: Tentacool
description:
Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer.
It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it
searches for prey.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Tentacruel
description:
When the red orbs on Tentacruel's head glow
brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to
fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.

attacks.name: Stun Poison
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned and Paralyzed.

name: Slowpoke
description:
It is incredibly slow and dopey. It takes five
seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

name: Slowking
description:
When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke's
head and unlocked an extraordinary power.

attacks.name: Litter

abilities.name: Legendary Pulse
